title: JVC 140 cm (55 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart TV with Quantum Backlit Technology  (LT-55N7105C GRY)

product_specification.In The Box: 21N (LED TV IN, Remote Control 2N, Battery (AAA) 2N, Screws 6N, Table Top Base Stand 2N, User Manual 2N, Sensy Cable 1N, Wall Mount Bracket 1N, Wall Mount Screw 4N)
product_specification.Panel Type: A+ Grade Zero Dot Samsung Screen Cells with Quantum Blacklit Ultra HD Panel
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MP4, AVI, FLV, WMV,TS, MKV, MOV, DAT, VOB, RM
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: Audio Codec: MP3, WMA, M4A, AAC
product_specification.Processor: Cortex-A53 Quad Core (64 Bit) at 1.5 GHz
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Twitter, Miracast, Browser, Facebook, Amazon Prime, Playstore, Eshare, App Store Netflix,Youtube,Miracast can support resolution up to 1080p
product_specification.Content Providers: Facebook, YouTube, Hotstar, Amazon Prime, Netflix, Eshare, Netrange Supported Voot, Zee5, Hungama, Eros Now
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship. Parts and Labour Costs are Covered
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product By Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.

product_description.Stylish design: Featuring the Quantum Lit Technology, this TV has a 140-centimetre (55) screen that offers you an immersive viewing experience.
product_description.Edgeless Design with Metal Stand: Thanks to its bezel-less finish, this TV offers lifelike picture-quality so that your favourite videos and movies seem more immersive.

review:
Read the features on web site and decided to buy this 55" model of JVC.
Found much more than my expectation.
1) State of art product. Bazel less and edge to edge picture.
2) 50 Watts Sound output is Superb.
3) Picture quality is Superb. UHD.
4) It has Quantum Lit Panel which gives true & Rich Colours of picture.
5) The best part is that it has 2gb Ram and 16 GB Rom. Hence no buffering and lot of space for downloading further apps. No Hanging at all.
6) More than 500 pre loaded apps - so no need to download any app. you name the app and it is there.
7) Aesthetic wise - Superb. Champaign Gold colour of Sound bar gives a rich look to the product.
8) A Japanese brand with such feature packed product at this price is unbelievable.
9) The Service team came for installation just after delivery.
Quick Service response.
I would call it a best Buy

Such a fantastic product. O edges, looks so sleek... so many apps, motion sensor remote, and colour and picture is tooo good.... thank you FLipkart. Thank you JVC, great product. Very satisfied, highly recommended.

Pros: 1) Looks premium, better than any other TV in the market. 2) Excellent picture quality: whether the content is 4k, HD or SD. It looks awesome. Blacks are true blacks, colors look natural. HDR10+ really works and gives good detail. 3) Sound: Extremely good. Loud and clear sound bar with four speakers and 2 tweeters. Activating surround sound fills the room. 4) App store: JVC as well as Android app store. Gives you access to all the apps that you may need 5) Sensy TV to control your set top box from TV remote or mobile phone. Cons: PS4 pro uses HDR whereas this TV has HDR10+ which is better than HDR. But not recognised by Sony, hence your PS4 will not recognize this TV as HDR capable. 2) No settings option to switch HDR10+ to HDR. 3) Only 2 USB ports, you will have to use one for provided blue tooth remote and other for Sensy cable. You will need to remove one of these to put the hard disk (I bought a 4 port USB hub to resolve the issue. It works well) 4) It is not official Android. 5) No voice support on remote control. 6) Smart remote pointer doesn't work reliably. instead I use eshare app on my mobile which works like a charm. 7) JVC dues not provide software updates. 8) Due to old version of Android, Netflix and YouTube apps doesn't come in 4K. 9 Latest update 24 Dep 19 YouTube doesn't work anymore. on launching it says new version available, no option to skip the message. When I go to play store to download the new version, it says your device is not supported.

( bird's-eye view review)

JVC JAPAN (LT-55N7105C) is a very good option with very nice bezel-less design on its corners. It has UHD 4k resolution (even if when I test on Youtube, 4k type videos are seen as 1080 HD on last resolution on the App, but it plays 4k videos in external hard disk or pendrive). Viewing angles are very amazing (180°) & display is very crisp & bright. I don't have any problem regarding viewing it.

It runs on Android 5.1 fully customized app like your phone no limitation to install apps on google play as other Android TV, as well as you can install on JVC App store (the problem is most of a time the phone apps may fail on TV because those apps are designed for phones,… till this TV is not Google certified) and it has "Linux" based patchwall operating system which is very fluid & very easy to use. NETFLIX, amazon prime, Hotstar, EROSNOW, YOUTUBE are some of pre-installed on this TV, too many options are there to connect tis TV to your mobile phone as well as your PC.

It comes with very handy & nice features which are useful and easy to use. Its remotes are very unique both main and the Air Mouse with keyboard and have third party SENSY (Smart TV with Patchwall Launcher with sensy STB controller.)

In the front, It has 4 DTE sound bars inside with 2 twitters (25w+25) =50W which are loud enough (NO NEED HOME SOUND SYSTEM)

This Smart TV comes with 3 HDMI, 1 SD Card Reader (even SD card reader is not mentioned by the supplier and Flipkart) 2 USB, (connectivity =RF, AV IN, HDMI, USB, SD card, COAXIL, LAN (RJ45) Audio out) and the wall mount is good Quality. Aluminum TV stand is very good. Finally, the delivery service is very professional plus TV package is very good even the screen is laminating to avoid scratches in transportation time.

Jvc Japan is best
This tv is one of the best tvs I have purchased. It has FrAmeless design , and very sleek. It is metallic feel totally Japanese Finish. Sound quality is very loud and clear. Tv has unlimited apps inside due to netrange portal. Also picture quality is soothing to eyes.
Japanese product
Japanese trust and Japanese brand is best.

the tv is good but the software does not support netflix youtube it keeps asking for update and when i update it say your device isnt compatible with this version, so far the old version of YouTube was working but since 2/3 days its not even working.

JVC Japan is Japan company,so TV look & feel is very high quality & like Japanese product.
As promised,installation was very fast.
TV has 2 remotes-1 normal remote with direct to apps key buttons,1 querty keypad & wify remote.Both are very nice & work seamlessly.
The best part is- it is edge to edge frameless TV, I have never seen like this. Very -very nice looking.
One more good thing is it has great JVC speakers with JVC Japan sound quality, it is wow.
As promised, apps are unlimited in the TV.
Very easy to use & good quality product.
I Recommend, 1 must go for JVC Japan.

JVC 55" UHD 4K is quite a treat to watch.
It makes the living room a live theatre with its size, sound quality, visual effects, black & golden look and latest features. It will change the home theatre concept forever and soon will be recognized as smart TV with home theatre. The installation was also very quick and without any hassle. Staff was extremely cooperative and friendly. I would definitely recommend everybody for JVC 55 inch ultra HD 4K as it provide a very unique experience at affordable price.

Excellent looks, perfect sound even without home theatre, lots of media is available to enjoy, easy and fast accessibility of features with smart remote, nice product on a very attractive price, good experience, seems I am direct in touch with the whole world, CHA GAYE JVC.......

it's an awesome product in this price segment, truly magnificent work. it doesn't play 4k videos through youtube, but you can play them through usb/hard drive. Bluetooth mouse may not work properly when go far from tv as the bluetooth connected at the back of tv. if you get usb extension then it works absolutely fine. People mentioned support is worst from Jvc, i didn't get any issues yet so need to check that case. when it comes to TV, go for it blindly.

Pros: Japanese Brand. Good Product. Good Display, Sound quality is also very good. Value for money. Most of the things are as promised. Quick delivery and installation by FlipKart. Very good viewing angles, can see from any angle. Blacks are handled nicely. Feels nice to see HD movies on big screen with quality sound. Flipkart is offering additional 6 months free warranty to select customers I guess.

Cons: Main desperation, You Tube 4K videos do not show up. Can't upgrade You Tube app. No YouTube casting possible. My old Sony TV YouTube had that option. Could directly cast running YouTube video from Phone or Laptop to the TV. So not so truly smart. Doesn't support Dolby output by TATA Sky HD set top box. Air mouse tough to handle. EShare app covers for it and gives good alternative interface.

Overall very good TV compared to the options available in same price range with similar features. Happy to have this product.

JVC Brand is a Excellent Quality Product.

I had ordered JVC Brand Tv because I was already using the same JVC Tv from past years from 2010 and still there is no single problem also with my old JVC tv.
And as usually the new tv which I bought is also very much super and worth full.

I have received JVC 55 inch TV on 17.07.19 and installed on 22.07.19. I have observed the following draw backs.
1. Android version 5.1 is available. It may be upgraded to Oreo please.
2. Voice remote is not available. Please replace the existing remote with Voice remote for searching easily.
3. Sensy cable is not working with most of the Setup Boxes which were supplied by the Cable Operators.
4. Warranty extension is not available.
5. Prime videos are not up to the mark comparing with Fire TV Stick. It may be upgraded please.
6. Bluetooth is not available.

It is highly recommended TV to purchase everyone. Except the above, TV performance is very nice. Especially, Display is outstanding and Sound is crystal clear with bass effect. Thank u Flipkart.
Best Led Tv in market , but Flipkart had not mentioned many functions which are available in product, like sound output and memory card reader

its a good product with this price range,picture quality is good sound is best, connectivity is fair enough, overall best product for this price range. reviewed by using for a week will update after 6 months
excellent smart TV, good picture quality, good sound quality, excellent performance.i am really very happy with this product.

I am using JVC 4K UHD Android TV for past 6 months. It has perfect wireless conectivity and picture quality and Sound Bar is extremely good and one does not required home theater. If company get me its bigger size 65 Inches with buyback I will go for it. I love this product.

since this is android based tv so no voice recognization is present on remote.however via tv andrpid app you can do that.speakers are good but not like a home theatre system.picture quality is very good but use hd channels only. design you gonna love it gives feel like sony bravia sereis. all necessary apps runs on this tv.all n all a good package considering this price range

Must buy.
Awesome led tv with awesome features at best price.
Value for money. Excellent picture and sound. Installation on the next day. Good service backup.

excellent product, value of money, must buy.. excellent sleek royal look perfect sound without home theatre, picture quality too good. installation & demo done with in 6hrs from the date of delivery.. thanks JVC, thanks Flipkart..

It's Extremely and extraordinary TV. picture quality very very nice while contrast up to 10000 and others only 4000 to 7000 only and sound comparison with others it's good due to up to 40w but other TV brand like MI VU are only 20W .Price also low caparison with others finally worth for money . Only one issue not in TV installation person's are unknown about this TV it to be improved .highlight :Very good TV,, Brand name.this brand in market standing up to fifty years in electronic market
Picture, sound, everything perfect except android OS, its not a smart tv, don't buy if you need smart tv. Even company is not providing any upgrades regarding os.. now its simply tv without smart..
Awesome Features. Love to have JVC led... perfect picture sound quality also good on other words good combo of technology . Thanks to flipkart

It's d best TV at this price with backlit quantam technology which gives superb picture quality, Surround sound which no other TV can provide in this category.50W speakers which r only in premium range of TVs.Only one thing that pinches is that the Co should advertise it with these USP's so as to get great mileage n ofcourse sales.

Loved the TV as the look & feel is very high & good quality. As promised, Delivery is on time. All the equipment and manuals were there - 2 remotes - 1 normal remote & 1 qwerty keypad & smart remote. Both are fully functional and have hotkeys too.

Best Part is it's frame-less TV frame which is very nice looking. Another Bestest part is that it has great JVC speakers with JVC Japan DTE sound quality, it is just WOW and the inbuilt box speakers just enhance the sound.
As mentioned it does have unlimited apps inside offering much content to watch in the TV.
Very easy to use & good quality product. I will surely recommend this to all.

After a year and half of usage, the sound suddenly has stopped working on tata sky. After multiple efforts and hdmi cable and then set top box change it is understood that the tv has an issue. :(
Will try getting jvc support and write a fresh review based on the promptness of support
TELEVISION HAVING GREAT SCREEN QUALITY, ALSO HAVING GREAT SOUND QUALITY, FLIPKART SALES SUPPORT IS ALSO GREAT

its really really amazing product.
picture quality gives me 100% satisfaction.
sound is superb than any other tv in market.
connectivity also good.not faced any issue from last 2 days use. running really smooth in youtube and hotstar.and with miracast as well.
i am big fan of samsung picture quality but i recommend you this JVC tv.bcz its picture quality is also beautiful. but sounds is fantabulous.
in market lot of tv i have seen. as per picture clearity i give rank to

and thank you flipkart for fast timely delivery and installation as well.in this price this is perfect tv for any tv lover.

Amazing product
I have been using it since the last two months
The product is very good and feels very rich for this value range
i m satisfied with this product . sound is very much clear and display is so nice and one more thing that this is not a chinese product and much better than expectations in this price

Amazing product by Flipcart this TV get true Dolby Digital Sorround Sound 4k Picture display Awesome Smart Led TV true value of Money a must buy product those says its not a good product may be in their product defective or Technical issues but actually the product is mind blowing. Thanks to Flipcart who give me such a product like this....

Extraordinary picture n sound. Slight sluggish while using apps. No voice command on remote hence cant work with alexa. Both Remote good qlty. TV slim n beautiful. Expecting newer android version update soon to ensure smoother airmouse operation. Overall nice deal at mouthwatering price. Simply go for it if u dont require optical sound out and Bluetooth connectivity. Previously I used Sony LCD and LED tv since last 8 yrs but this tv in comparison is not behind in term of pic qlty surely.

Pros :
1. You've bought one of the best TV's in this price range.
2. Picture and Audio quality meets more than your requirement.
3. Bezel less design looks fantastic.
4. No lagging while switching between apps.
5. Wifi connectivity has no problem at all.
6. Motion sensor works really well.
7. Screen mirroring and E-sharing features work fantastically.

Cons :
1. YouTube and Netflix doesn't work. Since there is no update for the OS, the old version doesn't support and it is not able to install the latest version by any means I've tried. I've been using other 3rd party apps to stream videos on YouTube. If you're a Netflix user, kindly take this into account.
2. Bluetooth's absence is prominent.
3. Updates never come.
4. The OS is Android-based and not true android.

If you're going to buy a TV in this price range, go for it. If money isn't a big deal, then I'd like to prefer Mi or the newly emerged Nokia TV or OnePlus TV.

picture quality of my dth channels are too good. hd channel produce stunning picture just like 4k video of YouTube. sound was really good and volumous also. value for the money i invested. apps are working except Netflix which could not play movie.
Excellent TV in this price range sound quality is wonderful. Speedy delivery by flipcart and on-time free installation by company executive recommend for everyone who wants value for money

Great product at budget price , awesome picture with 50 watt rich sound like a mini theater at home . Every family members of my house very much like this tv. Flipkart delivery is also great delivered product within 3days and jvc's 247 service engineer install this tv very next day . Thank you Flipkart , thank you JVC .
Awesome thanks so much for Flipkart, excellent smart TV very low cost this 55inch model more than in any brand, sound quality likes home theater system
Awesome product by JVC .... good picture quality ... Great sound effects..... always sound quality best from JVC.... Satisfied ....

Excellent output from JVC 55 4k. I am fully satisfied for money and worthful shopping. I was searching Flipkart for last two months for this JVC 55 4K TV because of out of stock in my area and finally I got a day. I am so happy and enjoy the entertainment with my family . Thanks for JVC crew and Flipkart also. Please add a Bluetooth option for your next version.

Great Upscaling capabilities and audio.
Good Video Quality and connectivity.

Bluetooth not available so problem in connecting easy wireless access and voice assistant. very ...

Great Product...
Excellent LED smart 4k TV. Good picture & sound quality.. nice look.. all applications are run properly. Mind blowing purchase.. value for Money..

Superb product at a very reasonable price. Very happy with the quality of the product. Sound quality is excellent.. Shipping and installation by flipkart team deserves appreciation. I would recommend 100%.

There are some connectivity issues with this TV.
When I connect to WiFi it was automatically disconnected after 3 to 4 mins even while playing Youtube video also.
Same thing is happening for Miracast, when am casting from mobile phone to TV it was lagging and disconnecting.
When am playing offline videos from hard-disk using VLC player it was lagging and missing synch between audio video.
When it comes to picture quality and sound it was awesome.

its Awesome Product,Good Sound Quality,
I get the Delivery 2 days Early then Estimate Date.
I am Happy from this Product.

not satisfied with picture quality and today i.e.15thnovember 2019 board of TV spoiled and waiting for replacement.

picture quality is good and sound quality is very very good.and LCD tv look is very rich.
The only thing I am missing on this tv is Bluetooth. Rest is nice.
Nice TV in this price, amazing sound quality, and picture quality.

Remote is more complicated, and not as per the standard of JVC pictures not as per the specification of 4K. need more time to understand the kit. The Best part is the sound But over all the best TV I ever had.
Amazing TV very clear pictures without any lag in browser.. I suggest you to go for it..
flipkart network is very good.same time delivery, same time installation.about jvc 4k led is picture & sound quality very good.

More than Awesome 👌. Fully delighted considering all operational aspects.
It's really Value for money spent.

Youtube is not working. I have contacted seller and company officials. But they did not give any solution. Simply blamming.The problem is youtube shows need to update, while updating it is showing it is not compatible. TV firm ware update is also not giving jvc. Waste of money and time without updates. Without this there is no meaning it is a smart tv. Then yours choice.

Too bright. Hurts the eyes. Android version is Kitkat. No update of YouTube. Many app based programs crash. Tried to contact JVC India for firmware update but they refused to handle any TV product. No update of firmware available anywhere on the internet. Probably a second rate manufacturer from Delhi has acquired the license to assemble in India. The brand is not mentioned in Flipkart exchange (You need to select 'Others'). I sacrificed a beautiful Panasonic 50 inch plasma TV for it as exchange and regret the decision. Picture and sound adjustment do nothing. Even if one reduces the backlight to Zero, screen still stays garish bright. If you try to reduce brightness/contrast, the picture vanishes into a dark, imperceptible screen. And, a very clumsy engineer came to install, whom I had to guide as he lost his wits.

dont buy this tv friends. first you tube is not working. after jvc tv technician guy come reset tv. 2 times but still not working. as well netflix is not work. prime & hotstar old version perform quite good. this is not smart tv. any app not working. worst tv ever
"It's a good led tv it has good pichure quality and sound

but they have given the latest software installer in all the TV which helps the below issues. the below issues got sorted today it awesome and thanks I saw one upgrade patch for YouTube which I have installed. picture quality is awesome no doubt in it. YouTube app is not working after you purchase. it tries to update and gets stuck happening for all the customers
very good
awesome HD picture quality and even better sound quality.sounds like home theater. really satisfied.value for money

You will not disappointed by picture quality or sound quality.
Only thing worry is aftersale.
Better get firestick or any better android box rest you will enjoy it.
A Best TV with good sound for this price.

The TV is best but the installation person does not know how to install on wall and drilled in the wall upside down, then fitted the TV on wall with only four screws instead of six supplied by JVC. Among four bolts, kept one screw loose and after insisting to tighten screw properly, he denied and left...!
So JVC and flipkart must look into the matter with valued customers.

theatre like sound, smart features are good

delayed in installation

It's value for money
awesome Looking smart..with soundbar look..
nice pic quality.sound superb.value 4money.thank u jvc

Worst tv ever. They claim to support 4K HDR but it doesn't work with my ps4 pro. They are making fool of us. So many bugs and no software update till now to resolve the issue. Picture quality is too bright and so many color correction issues. There customer care support is even worse.
Product is decent but I would have wanted an option of Extended Warranty option so that it gives additonal piece of mind in case of any issues in future.

Absolutely terrible experience with this TV. JVC is falsely advertising it as HDR10. It has no HDR support whatsoever. Their technician who performed the installation (after many delays) told me the same, despite the box and the manual having claims of HDR compatibility. Tried with Xbox one x and ps4 pro. Flipkart is dilly dallying with the return/refund process.

Speakers - barely better than standard TV speakers. No bass, poor mids and harsh treble.

Display - good contrast and colors, but not HDR as advertised.


UI - Awful. Runs on android 5, incompatible with most modern apps. Netflix and prime are using mobile app versions and are not really fit for the big screen. I should also mention that the UI is quite laggy.

If you've got a 4k firestick and don't have a need for HDR, this is not a bad TV, but be wary of its flaws and don't buy it for its speakers because you'll be disappointed.
